## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
## user-generated files

# User-specific files
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Build results
bin/
obj/
[Bb]uild/
[Ll]og/
[Ll]ogs/

# Publish output
publish/
out/

# Visual Studio cache
.vs/
.vscode/

# MSTest test results
TestResults/
*.VisualState.xml
*.cache
*.dat
*.dbmdl

# SQL Server files
*.mdf
*.ldf

# Local DBs
*.db
*.sqlite

# Environment secrets
.env
.env.*

# NuGet
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
packages/
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json
.nuget/

# Others
*.log
*.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Rider
.idea/

# ReSharper
_ReSharper*/
*.[Rr]e[Ss]harper

# dotCover
*.dotCover
